question: Joshua receives 130 emails a day. 20% of those emails don't require any response. He responds to the rest of them. How many emails does Joshua respond to in a 7 day work week?
answer:
Joshua receives 130*20/100=<<130*20/100=26>>26 emails that don't require a response
So he responds to 130-26=<<130-26=104>>104 emails per day
In a 7 day work week, Joshua responds to 104*7=<<104*7=728>> 728 emails
#### 728
